alt.help: This is the alternative description text for the image to make it accessible

captions.help: INDIeMedia URL of the file containing the transcript of the dialogue, sound effects, music tracks, and other audio information for viewers that are deaf or hard of hearing, or when the video/audio is muted. Subtitles are also displayed above the video.
captions.label: Subtitles (CC)

descriptions.help: INDIeMedia URL of the file containing text descriptions of what happens in the video for blind viewers or those who do not use a screen. The descriptions are read by a screen reader or converted into a separate audio track.
descriptions.label: Description

feedback.help: Enter the feedback the students will receive when they answer correctly and incorrectly
feedback.label: Feedback
